text: Mariel Franklin is a British author and an artist. Franklin was born in London, United Kingdom. == Early life and career == Born in London, United Kingdom, Franklin started her professional journey in London after completing her degree in University of London. Initially she started working with oil paintings using online imagery and tools. Franklin eventually stepped into tech industry later in 2023. She was featured in various magazines and outlets including New York Times, Guardian, FT, and Times. == Books == * Bonding, 2024 * Bonding: A Novel, 2025 == References == == Other Websites == * Official website
